applications.name: To-Do List (React Redux)

applications.name: TypeScript Find and Replace
applications.subHeading: A simple Find and Replace method
applications.description: Written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug. Capable of finding multiple occurrences and replacing all.

applications.name: Azure Functions .NET Core Unique Data Entry Api
applications.subHeading: Unique data entry implementing IEqualityComparer to manage illegal duplicate data entries.
applications.description: Using Azure Functions serverless compute and .NET Core, with a React user interface.

applications.name: Azure Functions .NET Core Data Structures Api
applications.subHeading: First in, first out (FIFO) and last in, first out (LIFO) data structures implemented with Queue and Stack in .Net.
applications.description: Using Azure Functions serverless compute and .NET Core, with a React user interface.

applications.name: AWS .NET Core Entity Sorting API
applications.subHeading: A sorting mechanism, implementing IComparable and IComparer to sort complex types
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET Core along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET Core Natural Sort API
applications.subHeading: A natural string sorting algorithm implemnting IComparer, taking a comma seperated string of alphanumerical values.
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET Core along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET Core Shopping Cart API
applications.subHeading: A basic shopping cart application, with data processing handled by a Serverless .NET Core RESTful API. React handles the UI.
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET Core along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.name: AWS .NET Core Asynchronous Coffee Maker API
applications.subHeading: Demonstraiting knowledge of asynchrony and multithreading.
applications.description: AWS Lambda serverless application (SAM), using .NET Core along with an AWS RESTful Gateway API.

applications.subHeading: A basic THREE JS scene

applications.subHeading: A simple random generator
applications.description: Generating a random string of A-B, 0-9 and a given length. Written with TypeScript, Sass and Pug.
